column2: Hello, *{{user_name}}*! I'm Ada - and let me be the first to welcome you to Hack!
I'm going to run you through how this program, The Clubhouse, works. Is that OK?
Great! You can use use the *left-most top button* to get to this, the main area of the Clubhouse.
That big switch on the *right* turns *Hack Mode* On and Off. Right now, it's *ON*, and you have access to everything in the Clubhouse.
If it's off, the Clubhouse turns off, and you're essentially using a normal computer.
The *middle top button* is the Pathways button. If you already know exactly what kind of activities you want to do, go there.
If you prefer to explore, talk to everyone here in the Clubhouse - we've got lots of interesting activities to do.
Your profile is in the upper left. You can change your name and profile picture using the Endless OS *Settings*.

To get directly to that section, click the picture way down in the far bottom right of the whole screen... 

...and then, in that popup menu, click *Settings*..

From there, you can go to the *Details* category (you might need to scroll down), then the *Users* category.
OK, that covers the basics - come find me if you want a more detailed explanation. Have fun!
Can't wait? I know the feeling! If you need any help, just click on me in the Clubhouse, and I'll fill you in.
